title: Extra Bonus RP is coming for a limited time!

replies.body:
"there will be no refunds for RP purchases made prior to the announcement or the promotion."

Great, i just spent $50 on RP 2 days ago and you do this, what a nice company Riot games is.{{champion:32}}
Pretty sure they didn't do this just to annoy you. Logic/10
thats sad..........i never get the $50......im not allowed, which is gay but i only get 10 and 25
I remember the days when i wasn't allowed to play for as long as i wanted, i could buy whatever i wanted though since it was my money that i earned, cant you just go buy it without anyone knowing?

So you would rather them give you 2 weeks notice? Then what do they do when people buy RP just before the 2 week notice and start complaining, saying "Great, i just spent $50 on RP 2 days ago and you do this, what a nice company Riot games is."
either way, if the bonus didnt come out, you wouldn't be complaining

They have to make profit mate! If your smart enough and have a life you wouldn't have a need to buy money for games. They are sucking u in purely so that you buy more money, spend more money on the game and they don't have to lose anything for you to do this. Why spend money on a game, when it's just a game... $10 you could go out get an ice cream or something, $20 you can go see a movie with mates, $50 you can buy your girlfriend a valentine present, $100 you can get an awesome birthday present for yourself or someone else. But instead u spend it on a game, losing your social life and your own money. I don't care what you people think but I'm just saying, Why?
lol what do you mean girlfriend... we're playing lol??

I logged in just to say; 
I turned 26 last week, i'm married, own my own business and i play lol like every day.... 
I own every champ, most runes an a heap of skins..... 
Don't stereotype.... 
Not all gamers are nerds with no life...
If they don't like ti then why play the game if you are going to constantly winge about it
I'm not stereotyping I'm just saying people are complaining over a game...

You get my point though mate. Why waste your money on a game. It's sucking you in, you may not have a girlfriend but maybe that's because you spend to much on this game and don't have a social life. :P
You've spent two days arguing over a game.
Can spend another two... Thousand!{{champion:26}}

"If your smart enough" 

What about my smart enough?{{champion:48}}
wowowoowwow its the 12th of January and there is no RP bonus added yet:(RITO PLZ {{item:3070}}
so if we have bought a card but have not put in the code yet will it be worth more or the normal amount?
NA Server gets a free Mystery Gift, and we get this? thats lame as.
we get free mystery gifts as well....lol
Just redeemed my code and I only got 3280 RP instead of 3750 RP
probably you redeemed it too early and I still haven't redeemed mine got me 2 $25
Also does people that purchase rp in nz still receive the bonus 3750 rp?
When they Post these thing rito is in america remember that so our 12 is their 11Th so when they say we got it on the 12th its most likely to be on the 13th
this is on the oce sever so they cant say that by the 12th is actually the 13th for us

Now that's just silly. It's 12th of January 12.50 AEDT. I would assume that I would still gain double bonus RP from my $25 RP card as the OCE Riot servers are run using AEDT. But I only got the standard 3280 RP when I should get getting the 3750 RP stated above. I saved my RP card for this moment and I get the normal amount of RP. What is this? I'm pretty sure 12.50am on the 12th of January lies between January 12th and January 18th. If this is meant as NA 12th of January, you should have stated this information in the post above.
i just redeemed $25 rp card and it was past midnight so that means its the 12th but it gave me the normal amount rito wtf{{item:3070}}
just in time for me to buy my blood moon {{champion:412}} skin and blood moon {{champion:60}} skin yay oh and Riot i'm gonna be broke if you keep releasing so many good skins please stahp

full team blood moon
{{champion:84}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:60}}
what about bloodmoon{{champion:44}}
or blood moon{{champion:8}} still waiting for those skins riot

thx riot im gonna buy {{champion:201}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:6}{{champion:6}}  {{champion:101}} {{champion:62}}
Tryndamere with rp o.o
Was thinking of buying $35 of RP a few days ago, looks like I'm gonna have to wait :P
Start saving up for the 50$
I bought $25 of rp today so would it count or is that just rigged and ridiculous
It won't work, It isn't rigged and it isn't ridiculous.
I hate being a F2P {{champion:32}}
{{champion:81}} CAN SOMEONE GIFT ME PLEASE{{summoner:31}} {{item:3031}}
thanks for the extra rp :)
wait what!? i just bought $35 worth of RP just now and i didnt get the bonus amount....
what the hells going on i want to redeem but everyones saying they arent getting it come on rito i want to spend it today
Its already 12th of January today and I did not see the bonus RP available, is it not the time for the sale yet?
maybe next time it could say it starts on american time cause i just spent $25 on the 12/1/2015 and i did not get bonus RP
What gives? It's the 12th, I used my prepaid card, and I received the normal rate (3260RP), not 3750RP.

They should give people who bought RP 1 month ago the bonus too, that would sort out any flame cause of the sudden event and people who bought it before a months time know its been ages before the offer took place.

If a store holds a 20% off sale on a certain item, do they go and refund all people 20% of the price they payed for the same certain item? No, it's a special promotion that Riot is holding. It's not their fault that people bought/redeemed RP earlier. That would delete the purpose of having a limited time sale.
i heard a thing where riot are going to mystery gift everyone is that true?
